Terms of Services

The terms “our”, “we” and “us” refer to the individuals operating the WESG website.

These Terms of Services (”Terms”) govern your access and use on our WESG website and any material and services made available to you through this site. They apply to all visitors, user and others accessing the WESG site. Please read our Terms before using our website as accessing the Service bounds you to these Terms of Service. Your access to the Service is conditioned on Your acceptance and compliancy with these Terms of Services. These terms lay out the rights and responsibilities regarding Your use of our Service. Any nonconformity will result in an immediate termination and ban of Your account.

Users must be 18 or older. No one under 18 of age may use the Service.



User accounts
When creating our WESG account, you must provide Us with accurate, complete and current information at all times. You are always responsible for any activities or actions under your account. You may not disclose your password with any third party and must notify Us immediately on the occasion of any breach of security or unauthorized use under your password.



Your Right to Post Content
The WESG website allows you to post content. You are responsible for the content’s dependability, legality and appropriateness posted on Your account. By posting on the Service, You grant Us the right to use, modify, publicly display and distribute such content on and through the Service. You agree that this license allows us to make Your posted Content available to other users of the WESG website, who will be authorized to use Your Content subject to these terms. You retain any and every right to your submitted Content and You are responsible for protecting those rights. Your Content on our Service must never violate privacy rights, copyrights, contract rights, publicity rights or any other rights of any person.



Content Responsibilities
We are not responsible for the content on Users’ accounts. You explicitly agree that You are solely responsible for the Content, activity and actions whether done by you or any third person using your account. It is prohibited to post objectionable content on Our Service.
Examples of such objectionable Content includes but is not limited to:
-- Unlawful or promoting unlawful behaviour
-- Discriminatory content including references or commentary about sexual orientation, national/ethnic origin, race, religion or other groups
-- Content with malicious intent
-- Spam or any form of unauthorized solicitation
-- Containing/Installing any viruses, worms, malware, or other content designed to disrupt, damage or limit the functioning of any software, hardware or telecommunication equipment or to damage/obtain unauthorized access to data or other information
-- Violating any proprietary rights
-- Impersonating any entity
-- False information and features
 We reserve the right, but not the obligation, to determine whether or not the Content on Our Service is appropriate and compliant with these terms. We reserve the right to make any formatting or edit changes to any Content. We can also limit/revoke the use of Our WESG website if any the Content is objectionable. We cannot control all content posted by users, hence You must agree and understand that your use of our Service is under your own risk. We will not be liable in any way for the content including errors in content, loss or damage of any kind as a result of the content.



Intellectual Property
The Service and its Content (excluding Content posted by You or other users), will remain Our exclusive property. The Service is protect by copyright, trademark and other laws of both the Country and foreign countries.



Links to Other Websites
The WESG website may contain links to other site or services that are not owned/controlled by Us. We assumes no responsibility for the content privacy policies or practices of any third party websites. We shall not be liable for any damage or loss caused or allegedly caused by or in connection with the use on any such content. We encourage you to read the Terms for any referenced third-party websites or services you may visit.



Termination
We may terminate or suspend Your account without prior notice or liability for any reason, including if you breach these Terms of Service. Upon termination, your right to use our WESG website will immediately cease.



Governing Law
The laws of the Country, excluding its conflicts of law rules, shall govern this Terms and Your use of the Service. Your use of the Application may also be subject to other local, state, national, or international laws.



Changes to these Terms of Service
We have the right to modify and/or replace these Terms at any time. If this is the case, we will make an effort to provide a 30s day notice prior to the renewed terms taking into effect. By continuing to use Our Service after those revisions become effective, You are bound to these new Terms.



Concerns
Any concerns or disputes about or on Our Service can be resolved by contacting Us.



Contact Us
